post.text: Who are you fighting for? Donate in their honor to help Hillary win: hrc.io/2eJAFJD

comment.author: Heather
comment.text: Be careful what you say about this woman you may wind up dead!!!!!!

replies.author: Alexander
replies.text: Seriously dude grow some ovaries and stop embarrassing yourself with stupid comments like this. #IMWITHHER

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: Hillary actual campaigned in a Bar this Morning..in Miami...no joke....you can't make this up...Maybe she found a voter or two...Early Sunday Morning Drink Fest!
